title: Nirbhaya fund unutilzed 20,000 crore was assigned only 20% is used till date
selftext: Ten years on, the effectiveness of the Nirbhaya Fund in improving women’s safety in Delhi remains a subject of scrutiny.
comments: Quick! Use it before they give it to Adani
Better unutilized than stolen I guess
